meanings.sent1: Let's mutualize our toys so we can all play together.
meanings.sent2: The siblings decided to mutualize their allowance to buy a gift for their parents.
meanings.sent3: The friends mutualized their snacks for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: She mutualized her knowledge with her classmates to ace the exam.
meanings.sent5: The team mutualized their efforts to complete the project on time.

meanings.definition: To convert into a mutual company or organization
meanings.sent1: The decision to mutualize the business led to better collaboration among employees.
meanings.sent2: The community decided to mutualize the local library for better access to books.
meanings.sent3: The company mutualized its resources to improve services for customers.
meanings.sent4: The school board voted to mutualize the school into a cooperative for the benefit of all students.
meanings.sent5: The organization mutualized its structure to promote equality among members.
